properties.name: data
properties.summary: Data to transfer. This is ignored for GET and DELETE requests.

properties.name: handleAs
properties.summary: How to handle the response from the server. Default is 'text'. Other values are 'json', 'javascript', and 'xml'.

properties.name: method
properties.summary: The HTTP method to use to make the request. Must be uppercase.

properties.name: preventCache
properties.summary: Whether to append a cache-busting parameter to the URL.

properties.name: query
properties.summary: Query parameters to append to the URL.

properties.name: timeout
properties.summary: Milliseconds to wait for the response. If this time passes, the then the promise is rejected.
